solution_line_template: If each user posts an average of {questions_per_hour} questions per hour, the average number of answers posted on the forum is {answers_per_question_ratio} times the number of questions which totals to {answers_per_question_ratio}*{questions_per_hour} = <<{answers_per_question_ratio}*{questions_per_hour}={answers_per_hour}>>{answers_per_hour} answers per

In a day, with {hours_per_day} hours, the average number of questions asked by each member is {hours_per_day}*{questions_per_hour} = <<{hours_per_day}*{questions_per_hour}={questions_per_day_per_member}>>{questions_per_day_per_member},

If there are {num_members} users of the forum, the total number of questions asked is {num_members}*{questions_per_day_per_member} = <<{num_members}*{questions_per_day_per_member}={total_questions}>>{total_questions} questions in a day.
At the same time, a member posts an average of {answers_per_hour}*{hours_per_day} = <<{answers_per_hour}*{hours_per_day}={answers_per_day_per_member}>>{answers_per_day_per_member} answers in a day.

Since there are {num_members} members who use the forum, the total number of answers posted in the forum in a day is {num_members}*{answers_per_day_per_member} = <<{num_members}*{answers_per_day_per_member}={total_answers}>>{total_answers}.
In total, the number of questions and answers posted on the forum is {total_answers}+{total_questions} = <<{total_answers}+{total_questions}={total_posts}>>{total_posts}
